name: Karma Blade: The Ascension
description:
Karma Blade: The Ascension.

As you must arise from the darkness, your blade is the only help, but it carries the burden of Karma with it, the more you damage others, the more damage you take. In this journey to ascension, beware of the ones you hurt, Karma is bound to strike back

Developed for Global Game Jam 2022

Tiago Euzebio da Silva
*Game Dev

Guilherme Harder
*Sound Designer

Tools:
*Unity
*Blender
*Houdini
*Substance Designer
*FMOD
*Mixamo Animations and Chars
*Unity Asset Store Crystal and Fountain
